about_the_game:
Aralunis is a charming and personality-filled pixel art adventure where you play as Luna, a young princess determined to rescue her hero. Captured by mistake in her place by the powerful evil sorcerer known as Flames of Calamity, Luna must restore peace to her kingdom. Alongside her, embark on an epic journey through unique and enchanting landscapes, each more beautiful and challenging than the last.

Game Features:

  • 2D Platform Adventure with Casual Elements: Perfect for those who love to explore at their own pace, Aralunis offers an accessible and relaxing experience, while still challenging your platforming skills with precision and creativity.

  • Nostalgic Pixel Art Graphics: Admire vibrant, retro visuals carefully crafted in pixel art, bringing every detail of the kingdom of Aralunis to life. From lush forests to dark caves, snow-covered mountains, and mystical landscapes filled with giant mushrooms, each environment is designed to fascinate and immerse.

  • Varied and Unique Environments: Explore fascinating and distinct biomes, each with its own atmosphere, creatures, and challenges. From the serenity of the forests to the icy heights and kingdoms shrouded in darkness, every step reveals something new and surprising.

  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a soothing soundtrack that accompanies Luna on her journey, designed to provide a calming and unforgettable experience.

  • Inspiring Storyline: More than just a princess, Luna is a determined and brave heroine, willing to push her limits to save her loved ones and restore light to her home.

For Fans of Platform and Adventure Games: Aralunis is perfect for those seeking a casual, relaxing, and enchanting experience, blending classic 2D platform gameplay with the captivating charm of a fairytale.

Prepare to dive into an adventure that is both visual and emotional, where each stage of the journey reveals more of the magic of a pixel art kingdom, full of mystery, beauty, and courage. The fate of Aralunis is in your hands—and Luna is counting on you to help her overcome the darkness!

name: Aralunis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Or Better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 710 (2GB) Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Quad core Or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 (8GB) Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A princess in search of her hero and an epic journey against darkness. Uncover enchanting biomes in pixel art, from forests and mushroom fields to icy mountains and shadowy realms. A casual and relaxing experience for fans of 2D platform adventure
